paragraphs.content: Blessed is every one that feareth the LORD; that walketh in his ways.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Blessed is every one that feareth the Lord; that walketh in his ways.

paragraphs.content: For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.

paragraphs.content: Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.

paragraphs.content: Behold, that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the Lord.

paragraphs.content: The LORD shall bless thee out of Zion: and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord shall bless thee out of Zion: and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.

paragraphs.content: Yea, thou shalt see thy children’s children, and peace upon Israel.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Yea, thou shalt see thy children’s children, and peace upon Israel.
